name: get_coin_exchanges
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool coinranking.
Tool description: A simple API for Cryptocurrency Prices - 28k+ users - Real-Time & Historical - Crypto Market Data - Coins - Exchanges - Free & Paid
API description: Find exchanges where a specific coin can be traded.
This endpoint requires the **ultra** plan or higher.

uuid.description: UUID of the coin you want to request exchanges for

search.description: Value to search for within results, such as exchange names.

orderby.description: Field to order the results by. Allowed values are "24hVolume" and "price". Defaults to "24hVolume".

orderdirection.description: Order direction, either "asc" for ascending or "desc" for descending. Defaults to "desc".

offset.description:
Offset. Used for pagination

Default value: 0

limit.description: Limit for pagination. Defaults to 50. Should be within the range 0-100.

referencecurrencyuuid.description:
UUID of reference currency, which rate is used to calculate the volume. Defaults to US Dollar

Default value: yhjMzLPhuIDl
